database.name: cms
database.table: CREATE TABLE `cmsv3_AdminMenu` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `link` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `text` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `role_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `parent` int(11) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `priority` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=6 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `cmsv3_Article` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `url_title` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `content` text NOT NULL, `author_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `time_created` int(11) NOT NULL, `role` varchar(35) NOT NULL, `hits` int(11) NOT NULL, `time_last_changed` int(11) NOT NULL, `comments_disabled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=7 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `cmsv3_Comment` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `article` int(11) NOT NULL, `guestcomment` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `user` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `guest_name` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `guest_website` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `guest_email` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `ip` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `content` text NOT NULL, `date_written` int(11) NOT NULL, `published` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `article` (`article`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `cmsv3_Menu` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `text` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `link` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `role_id` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `parent` int(11) NOT NULL, `type` varchar(25) NOT NULL, `priority` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=10 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `cmsv3_Right` ( `id` varchar(35) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `priority` int(11) NOT NULL, `module` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `cmsv3_User` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `role_id` varchar(35) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `banned` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `activated` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `last_action` int(11) NOT NULL, `date_registered` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=14 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `cmsv3_Visitor` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `time_visited` int(11) NOT NULL, `ip` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `referrer` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `user_agent` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `querystring` varchar(500) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1191 DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
